column5: The steelhead itch finally got so bad I had to go... We left Montreal at midnight and headed towards New york State. Fished all day monday and tuesday till 11 am, we fighted around 25 fish between the 2 of us and got 15 or 16 to the net. All in all a great few days on the tribs, decent weather, great fish and good company! here is some fish porn.        The colors on all the fish we caught were incredible, most of the steelies were colored up but we did get a few chromers.  Pepe
Beauty fish!!!  You traveled far, worked hard and you were rewarded for your efforts!!  Congrats....great pics.
Excellent report, pics, and fish!!!  Thanks for posting that Pepe!!!
Nice fish dude! I'm hitting the tribs hard from Friday to Sunday. I hope my efforts prove as fruitful as yours!
Nice pics.....morning fish porn...always a good start to the day  Thanks for sharing.
Great report and pics Pepe  The colors on those fish really stands out    Congratulation and thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice lookin fish Pepe!    Hawk
nice pictures! i guess its worth the far drive for those pictures
Nice looking fish, the colors really stand out, thanks for sharing.
mmmm dat's nice!!  How much?!  Sometimes you just gotta go state-side..  cheers HD

Nice looking fish indeed! Gotta love the NY!  How do you find the folding net for ease of transport when on the stream?  Does it fit into the back pocket of your vest?  I'd like to get something like that.
sweet fish...Wow that's a long drive
Its ok but it's pretty short and the mesh tends to tangle up.  Thanks everybody for the nice comments!
Porns always good first thing in the morning.LOL  Nice looking fish Pep. TFS.
Nice pics good job.
great looking fall colour fish
Those are some nice fish, I'm sure they made the trip worthwhile.
Fine salmonids, the browns are specially pretty,  thanks.
nice  chrome  love seeing  steelie porn...
I'd say!!  Love the color of the browns   Streamerguy
